backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a workshop POS backend with access-controlled endpoints for user profiles, inventory, service records, customers, and transactions using a mixin authorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—login authentication fix and LoginPage error boundary—to their relevant source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every page, component, and hook in the React application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Workshop POS React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all eight page routes, an authentication guard that renders LoginPage when unauthenticated, and a shared AppLayout with MainNav and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/customer/Custome: Modal dialog for creating or editing a customer record, including fields for name, phone, discount settings, and a dynamic vehicle history list with add/remove controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainNav.t: Sticky top navigation bar with links to all seven app pages, active-state highlighting, a shop logo/name display, and a user dropdown menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/pos/CartLineItem: Stub component that accepts cart props but renders nothing, kept only to prevent import errors from legacy references.
frontend/src/components/pos/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar component for the POS app with three view buttons (Point of Sale, Products, History) that highlights the active view.
frontend/src/components/transaction/Rece: Print-friendly receipt component that renders shop info, transaction details, cart items, and total in a monospace layout using shop settings from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using the current Internet Identity or an anonymous identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication hook managing login/logout state and user CRUD operations (add, delete, update photo) stored in localStorage, with a default admin account.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Stub currency hook providing IDR formatting utilities for compatibility with legacy code.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: React Query hooks for customer data management, exposing get-all, search-by-name, upsert, and delete operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook that manages AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, and exposes identity state and status flags via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: React Query hooks for inventory management, providing get-all, add/update, and delete operations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the old draft persistence system; exposes no-op saveDraft and checkout functions for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the old POS draft system; returns a default draft object and no-op action functions to prevent import errors in legacy files.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Stub hook replacing the old products system; returns empty data and no-op functions for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useReports.ts: React Query hook that fetches a profit/loss report from the backend actor for a given date range when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useService.ts: React Query hooks for service record management, providing get-queue, get-all, add, and update-status operations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopSettings.ts: Hook and utility for reading and persisting shop settings (name, address, phone, logo, greeting) in localStorage with default fallback values.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransaction.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all transactions and adding a new transaction via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Stub/legacy hook that returns empty data, replaced by useTransaction.ts.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for a warm amber/ochre color theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDataPage.tsx: Customer management page supporting search, add/edit/delete, WhatsApp links, and Excel import/export of customer records.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by ReportsPage in the current system.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with a searchable table, add/edit/delete dialog, and Excel import/export for inventory items.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with a username/password form that authenticates against localStorage-stored users and shows error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by TransactionPage in the current system.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by InventoryPage in the current system.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Profit/loss reports page that aggregates transaction and inventory data into revenue, COGS, and per-item sales summaries with date filtering and print support.
frontend/src/pages/ServicePage.tsx: Service management page that displays a queue of service records and provides a form to add new service entries, with conditional navigation to the transaction page when a service is marked as completed.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shop settings page allowing users to configure and persist store information (logo, name, address, phone, greeting) to localStorage, with logo upload support.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionPage.tsx: Transaction/checkout page featuring customer autocomplete, a shopping cart for inventory items, transaction submission, and receipt printing via window.print().
frontend/src/pages/UserDataPage.tsx: User management page that supports adding and deleting workshop users with profile photo uploads, storing all user data in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/excelUtils.ts: Utility module providing CSV export and import functions for inventory items and customer records, including CSV parsing and BOM-prefixed file download helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens (primary, secondary, sidebar, chart, etc.), border radius variables, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a workshop cashier app, recording a known login bug (admin/admin123 fails with 'something went wrong') and two existing fix features targeting authentication logic and LoginPage error handling.
